name: Minor Simulator
description:
Live in the place of a minor who has to pay a debt of
$ 100,000 collect minerals, buy new picks to dig pay miners                                              faster to work at home, buy explosives to make 100 at once ...
-------------------------------------------------
 Command:
move with the arrow keys go to the hut (the store) to buy
various miner objects, click on the bubbles to pay them ...
--------------------------------------------------
The more you pay at the store, the more time spent by the object
the removal of the ore decreases

Price:
- pick (allows to dig faster)
$ 20
- minor (digs automatically even when you are not in the mine)
$ 50
- dynamite (you earn 100 minerals each time you hit the detonator)
$ 200
